overview: Video #14″Free Your Mind showcases the talents of three individuals in pursuit of personal freedom Take a ride with Dan Drehobl Rob Welsh and Darrell Stanton as they get a lift from some familiar faces who understand the liberation that is skateboarding As Da Clown says “Everyone does their own thing that’s what makes the world go round” Open up your funky mind and you can fly”  Dan Drehobl, Darrell Stanton, Rob Welsh
title: Free Your Mind
